name: resabs2d
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0
body: |- wi(w0, wceq(cres(cres(c0, c1), c2), cres(c0, c1)))

stmt.origin: syl(w0, wceq(cres(cres(c0, c1), c2), cres(c0, c1)), wss(c1, c2))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(cres(cres(c0, c1), c2), cres(c0, c1)))
-| wi(w0, wss(c1, c2))
-| wi(wss(c1, c2), wceq(cres(cres(c0, c1), c2), cres(c0, c1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(cres(cres(c0, c1), c2), cres(c0, c1)))
-| wi(w0, wss(c1, c2))
-| wi(wss(c1, c2), wceq(cres(cres(c0, c1), c2), cres(c0, c1)))

body.origin: |- wi(wss(c1, c2), wceq(cres(cres(c0, c1), c2), cres(c0, c1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(cres(cres(c0, c1), c2), cres(c0, c1)))
-| wi(w0, wss(c1, c2))

comment: Absorption law for restriction. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 23-Oct-2021.)
